152  chaos::uint64 register_function(
153  void (*callback_function)(function_parameters...))
154  {
155  // increment the global callback id and use it as this callback id
156  chaos::uint64 id = g_next_callback_id++;
157  // this callback shouldn't be registered
158  assert(m_callback_funcs.find(id) == m_callback_funcs.end());
159 
160  // store this function mapped under the id
161  CallbackData f;
162  f.owner = NULL;
163  f.function.standard = callback_function;
164  m_callback_funcs[id] = f;
165  return id;
166  }

200  void unregister_function(chaos::uint64 id)
201  {
202  // ensure the id is associated with this object
203  if (!has_function(id))

285  void trigger(function_parameters... params)
286  {
287  // iterate over the attached functions and call them
288  CHAOS_FOR_EACH(it, m_callback_funcs)
289  {
290  // member function?
291  if (it->second.owner != NULL)
292  {
293  it->second.function.member(it->second.owner, params...);
294  }
295  // standard function
296  else
297  {
298  it->second.function.standard(params...);
299  }
300  }
